text:
[Verse]
Sun's hiding behind the clouds
No worries we still dance loud
Raindrops falling on the ground
Finding joy where it's not found

[Verse 2]
Splashing puddles everywhere
Wind is tangling up our hair
Laughter fills the soggy air
In the rain
We feel no care

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Feeling free
It's our delight
Every drop
A shining light
In the rain
We hold on tight

[Verse 3]
Shoes are soaked
But spirits high
Jump as lightning cracks the sky
Raindrops in a sweet supply
Lost in rhythm
You and I

[Verse 4]
Melodies inside our heads
Not a word left unsaid
In this moment
We're well-fed
By the rain
No tears we shed

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain tonight
Feeling free
It's our delight
Every drop
A shining light
In the rain
We hold on tight
title: Dancing in the Rain
